subsections.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsections.refined_text: Visit the Calanques near Cassis for an unforgettable day of hiking, swimming, and boating with spectacular cliffside views.
Explore the historic old town of Nice and relax on the famous Promenade des Anglais — ideal for student groups.

subsections.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsections.refined_text: Consider booking hostels or boutique hotels in cities like Arles or Aix-en-Provence for affordable group stays.
Don’t miss out on tasting ratatouille, socca, and pissaladière — all local vegetarian-friendly options.

subsections.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsections.refined_text: To save on transportation, groups can purchase regional rail passes or book car rentals together in advance.
